component.description: Lightbox features a powerful overlay that can display images, multimedia content, other JSF components and external urls.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
style false java.lang.String Style of the container element not the overlay element.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the container element not the overlay element.
transition false java.lang.String elastic Name of the transition effect. Valid values are 'elastic','fade' and 'none'. Default is elastic.
speed false java.lang.Integer 350 Speed of the transition effect in milliseconds. Default is 350.
width false java.lang.String Width of the overlay.
height false java.lang.String Height of the overlay.
iframe false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies an iframe to display an external url in overlay. Default is false.
opacity false java.lang.Double 0.85 Level of overlay opacity between 0 and 1. Default is 0.85.
visible false java.lang.Boolean false Displays lightbox without requiring any user interaction by default. Default is false.
slideshow false java.lang.Boolean false Displays lightbox without requiring any user interaction by default. Default is false.
slideshowSpeed false java.lang.Integer 2500 Speed for slideshow in milliseconds. Default is 2500.
slideshowStartText false java.lang.String Label of slideshow start text.
slideshowStopText false java.lang.String Label of slideshow stop text.
slideshowAuto false java.lang.Boolean true Starts slideshow automatically. Default is true.
currentTemplate false java.lang.String Text template for current image display like "1 of 3". Default is "{current} of {total}".
overlayClose false java.lang.Boolean true When true clicking outside of overlay will close lightbox. Default is true.
group false java.lang.Boolean true Defines grouping, by default children belong to same group and switching is enabled. Default is true.
